Storages.searchCD

Function/Meaning
Search for CD
Type
Method of the Storages class
Syntax
searchCD(volume)
Arguments
volume Specifies the volume label of the CD to search for.
Return Value
Returns the drive letter of the found CD-ROM drive.
Description
Searches for a CD drive with the specified volume label and returns its drive letter (e.g., 'H').
Of course, the corresponding CD-ROM must be inserted in the drive.
